title: Unable to see MJPEG video from CCTV NVR
content: I'm remotely accessing a CCTV Network Video Recorder. All the admin functionality works, but I can't see the actual video stream from the cameras.
creator: andy24

title: In un altro pc dopo l'installazione di Firefox e il lancio del browser la rotellina scompare e si ferma il caricamento
content: Buongiorno se fosse possibile ricevere supporto tramite email in un determinato tempo: giorno e ora da parte Vs. io aprirei l'altro pc desktop permettendoVi di interagire. Purtroppo non so se Firefox non si avvia poiché ho problemi con Office 365, il quale é bloccato e dopo vari tentativi non risponde. Grazie. Saluti. Emilio.
creator: emilio1313

title: scrolling mouse su pagine web
content:
Buongiorno, ho effettuato l'aggiornamneto di ubuntu alla versione 22.04 e per avere lo stessa direzione di scrolling sia su ubuntu che su firefox per la navigazione dato che era invertito ho seguito la Vs. guida per poter reimpostare su firefox la direzione dello scroll del mouse, e fin qui tutto bene, sembrava che tutto funzionasse alla perfezione , finchè non mi accorgo che casualmente in alcuni siti è come se firefox non tenesse conto dell'impostazione e quindi il comportamento dello scroll si inverte... ho pensato che fosse causato dalla memorizzazione di tutti i dati archiviati dal browser e quindi li ho eliminati... ma niente da fare !!! e come se firefox avesse memoria di impostazioni prestabilite per quel singolo sito non tenendo conto delle nuove impostazioni....

Attendo qualche suggerimento in merito.

Cordiali Saluti Salvatore D'Alessandro
creator: sadale

title: computer very slow and freezes
content:
Since the last win 10 up grade the Firefox browser is using all RAM and CPu availability. 

I can type 2,  twenty words sentences before typing starts on the screen and then it is 1 letter at a time. IT is not Kaspersky internet security , and there is no problem if i use Google Chrome. Every indication is, that Microsoft has found a way to mess up the Firefox browser through the Google search engine, to make the Firefox use every bit of the ram and CPU to make consumers use the Google chrome browser. It would be much appreciated if the program writers can find exactly what has happened and if what I suspect is the case,  update Firefox with a patch  Regards Win 10 os 64 bit with 4gb ram, and Kaspersky internet security on a ASUS P5g41T-MLX mother board.
creator: billboyd09

title: HTTP protection just stopping my browsing.
content: I don't think HTTP protection is breaking the internet for me but it's just not letting me access my bookmarks! Either fix the problem for me or give me a link to go to! Thank you! I click on a bookmark then blocks my access.
creator: mikearreguin

title: Need to change time zone
content: When I schedule a post on my Wix blog site, it indicates I'm in the New York time zone. My time zone is Perth, Western Australia and my MAC computer is set up for this. How can I change the Firefox browser time zone setting to Perth, Western Australia too?
creator: marlane5

title: Website address suggestions
content:
I cannot turn off suggested website address'

If you cannot help, I am cancelling Firefox and going to Microsoft Edge.

Ron Marlborough
creator: marlisalad

title: Firefox changed my password, but didn't save it!
content:
Hey Firefox Team,

Earlier this evening, I was doing a little security update and changing the password to my Twitter and email addresses. Standard stuff. Firefox suggested a secure password and I agreed; Firefox came up with a good one. The key icon in the URL bar showed a little message that said it had saved the passwords. Hooray.

It turns out, it didn't update my passwords at all and now I am locked out of my accounts. Firefox hasn't saved these new passwords it came up with and I'm stuck with my old ones which, obviously, don't work.

What can I do?
creator: JTDJTD
